Header.joinUs: Join us in mapping the world of OER!

NotificationWelcome.welcomeTo: Welcome to the OER World Map!
NotificationWelcome.goal: Our goal is to provide the most complete and comprehensible picture of the global Open Educational Resources (OER) movement. Information is collected on people, organizations,services, projects and events related to OER.
NotificationWelcome.building: Building the map is a collaborative process. You can

Register.loginInfo: When you click the login button your browser will present you a popup where you can enter your email address and password
Register.forgotPasswordInfo: Enter your email address, we will send you a temporary password
Register.privacyAccepted: By registering, I agree to the terms of the privacy policy. I specifically agree to publish the information I provide, except for my password, which will be stored securely. Your activities within OER World Map will also be stored and processed for the purpose of improving the service as well as to prove your consent to specific activities.*
Register.termsAccepted: I also agree to the Terms of the service. Especially, I will ensure, that no rights of others are violated by me publishing information through OER World Map. This includes the privacy and copyrights of others.*
Register.publishEmail: I agree to having my email-address published as part of my profile
Register.subscribeNewsletter: I want to subscribe to the OER World Map Newsletter
Register.name: Your Name ...

Password.info: Enter your current and desired password. After hitting the button you will be logged out
